A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I LOVE Star Wars...but this was a TERRIBLE movie (as others have stated here).  Total waste of time.  I want my money back.

LUKE - I get that they wanted to show how Luke had changed but the direction they took him was NOT congruent to the Luke of Return of the Jedi.  

LEIA - ummm yeah ok.  So you're more powerful than Mace Windu?

SNOKE - So yeah you're so powerful yet...

Plot holes (non-sensical fleet chase\, stupid casino scene\, Rey's escape).  Trying too hard to be funny with bad jokes and obviously trying to play to a younger audience. The fun and exciting characters from Awakens were not fun nor exciting (Poe\, Finn\, Rey).  Miserable child acting from the extras.  

Stay at home and watch "Force Awakens" - heck I left the cinema wishing I had just watched "Phantom Menace".  That's how much this POS sucks.  DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY.
